digital.translation[0].definitions[0].de: using a system in which information is recorded or sent out electronically in the form of numbers, usually ones and zeros
digital.translation[0].definitions[1].de: giving information in the form of numbers
digital.translation[0].definitions[2].de: relating to the fingers and toes
digital.translation[1].definitions[0].de: digital electronic equipment receives sound and pictures from BINARY electrical signals (=signals using the numbers 0 and 1)
digital.translation[1].definitions[1].de: relating to a business activity that uses the Internet
digital.translation[1].definitions[2].de: the difference between the people that own computers and know how to use the Internet and those that do not
